A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually nice\, but several characters were empty and not needed for the story's main story arc; including\, disappointingly\, Finn's. Got the impression this movie was aimed in trying to makeup for the countless movies that came before that involved strong male/weak female characters. Portray of Luke Skywalker was a farce\, going against Star Wars canon. Yet another greedy and integrity-challenged modern Disney film.
